title: Attica
short_description: A gripping documentary that explores the infamous 1971 prison uprising in Attica, New York.

title: The Ballad of Gregorio Cortez
short_description: A riveting tale of a Mexican-American farmer who becomes a fugitive in Texas during the 1900s.

title: Behind Every Good Man
short_description: An early exploration of transgender life, focusing on the story of a trans woman in 1960s Los Angeles.

title: Betty Tells Her Story
short_description: A poignant short film about a woman named Betty and her personal journey of self-discovery.

title: Bush Mama
short_description: A powerful drama about an African-American woman struggling with life in the Watts district of Los Angeles.

title: Cab Calloway Home Movies
short_description: A collection of home movies featuring the legendary jazz musician Cab Calloway.

title: Carrie
short_description: A chilling horror film about a shy, bullied high school girl who discovers she has telekinetic powers.

title: Charade
short_description: A thrilling romantic comedy about a woman pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen.

title: Cyrano de Bergerac
short_description: A classic romantic drama about a poetic but large-nosed man who helps a handsome man woo the woman he himself loves.

title: Hairspray
short_description: A fun and vibrant musical comedy about a teenager's dream to dance on a local TV show in 1960s Baltimore.

title: House Party
short_description: A hilarious comedy about a high schooler who throws a house party while his parents are away.

title: Iron Man
short_description: An action-packed superhero film about a wealthy industrialist who builds a high-tech suit of armor to save his own life and then uses it to fight evil.

title: Itam Hakim, Hopiit
short_description: A compelling documentary about the Hopi people and their connection to the land.

title: The Little Mermaid
short_description: A beloved animated musical about a young mermaid who makes a deal with a sea witch in order to become human and win the love of a prince.

title: Manzanar
short_description: A thought-provoking short film about the Manzanar internment camp where Japanese-Americans were held during World War II.

title: Mardi Gras Carnival
short_description: One of the earliest known films, capturing the vibrant and lively Mardi Gras Carnival in New Orleans.

title: Mingus
short_description: An intimate documentary about the life and work of jazz musician Charles Mingus.

title: Pariah
short_description: A powerful drama about a Brooklyn teenager who juggles conflicting identities and risks friendship, heartbreak, and family in a desperate search for sexual expression.

title: Scorpio Rising
short_description: An experimental short film that juxtaposes biker culture with religious iconography and Hollywood imagery.

title: Super Fly
short_description: A gritty crime drama about a drug dealer who tries to score one more big deal before he quits the business for good.

title: Titicut Follies
short_description: A harrowing documentary that exposes the conditions at the State Prison for the Criminally Insane at Bridgewater, Massachusetts.

title: Tongues Untied
short_description: A groundbreaking documentary that explores black, gay identity through a mix of personal testimonies, poetry and performance.

title: Union Maids
short_description: A documentary about three women who participated in the labor movement in Chicago during the 1930s and 1940s.

title: When Harry Met Sally
short_description: A charming romantic comedy about two friends who resist their chemistry to maintain their friendship, only to realize that it's really love.

title: Word is Out: Stories of Our Lives
short_description: A groundbreaking documentary that features interviews with 26 gay men and women, discussing their lives and experiences.

title: Chicana
short_description: A powerful documentary that explores the experiences of Mexican-American women involved in the Chicano Civil Rights Movement.

title: Cooley High
short_description: A coming-of-age film about a group of high school friends in 1960s Chicago, navigating the ups and downs of adolescence.

title: Evergreen
short_description: A musical drama about a young woman who becomes a star, but struggles with the pressures of fame and love.

title: Flowers and Trees
short_description: An animated short film about two trees in love, threatened by a mean old tree. The first ever color cartoon to win an Oscar.

title: The Flying Ace
short_description: A silent film about a World War I fighter pilot who returns home a war hero and helps solve a mystery.

title: Hell-Bound Train
short_description: A unique silent film that uses a metaphorical train journey to depict the consequences of sinful behavior.

title: Jubilo
short_description: A silent comedy about a tramp who helps a woman and her young daughter escape their abusive husband and father.

title: The Long Goodbye
short_description: A neo-noir film about a private detective who gets embroiled in a murder case while trying to find his friend's missing wife.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
short_description: The first installment of the epic fantasy trilogy, where a young hobbit embarks on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: The Murder of Fred Hampton
short_description: A documentary about the life and death of Fred Hampton, the young, charismatic leader of the Black Panther Party in Chicago.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
short_description: A horror film about a group of teenagers who are terrorized in their dreams by the disfigured killer, Freddy Krueger.

title: Pink Flamingos
short_description: A cult classic about a drag queen who competes with a couple to be named the "filthiest person alive".

title: Requiem 29
short_description: A documentary about the tragic events of the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago, where police and protesters violently clashed.

title: Return of the Jedi
short_description: The final installment of the original Star Wars trilogy, where the Rebel Alliance makes a final stand against the Empire.

title: Richard Pryor: Live in Concert
short_description: A stand-up comedy film featuring the legendary Richard Pryor in his element, delivering a hilarious and poignant performance.

title: Ringling Bros. Parade Film
short_description: An early silent film showcasing the grand parade of the Ringling Brothers Circus.

title: Selena
short_description: A biographical drama about the life and career of Tejano music star Selena Quintanilla-Pérez.

title: Sounder
short_description: A drama about a black sharecropper family in Louisiana during the Great Depression.

title: Stop Making Sense
short_description: A concert film featuring a live performance by the rock band Talking Heads.

title: Strangers on a Train
short_description: A thriller about a tennis player and a psychopath who plot to swap murders.

title: Wall-E
short_description: An animated film about a lonely waste-collecting robot on a deserted Earth who falls in love with a sleek, high-tech robot.

title: Watermelon Woman
short_description: A drama about a young black lesbian working on a film about a black actress from the 1930s known for playing stereotypical "mammy" roles.

title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane
short_description: A psychological thriller about a former child star who torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

title: Who Killed Vincent Chin
short_description: A documentary about the murder of Vincent Chin, a Chinese-American man, in a hate crime in 1982.

title: The Wobblies
short_description: A documentary about the Industrial Workers of the World (IWW), a radical labor union in the early 20th century.

title: The Battle of the Century
short_description: A classic silent comedy film that features a hilarious pie fight, which is considered one of the largest in cinematic history.

title: The Blues Brothers
short_description: A musical comedy about two brothers who reunite their band to save the Catholic home where they were raised.

title: Bread
short_description: A silent drama about a woman who uses her inherited wealth to help the poor.

title: Buena Vista Social Club
short_description: A documentary about a group of talented musicians from Cuba and their journey to perform in New York.

title: Cabin in the Sky
short_description: A musical fantasy about a man who gets a second chance to prove he deserves to go to heaven.

title: A Clockwork Orange
short_description: A dystopian crime film about a violent gang leader who undergoes experimental rehabilitation with controversial techniques.

title: The Dark Knight
short_description: A superhero film where Batman faces his most dangerous enemy yet, the Joker, who wreaks havoc on Gotham City.

title: The Devil Never Sleeps
short_description: A documentary that explores the mysterious death of the filmmaker's uncle and the secrets of her family.

title: Freedom Riders
short_description: A historical documentary about civil rights activists who challenged segregation in the American South in 1961.

title: Grease
short_description: A musical romantic comedy about high school love in the 1950s, filled with catchy songs and dance numbers.
